column1: form_arabia_title; Arab unity;;;;;;x;;
form_arabia_desc;Idea of pan-Arabism
column2: advanced by thinkers and religious leaders
column3: has always excited the minds of the emirs and sultans of the Middle East. Now
column5: and is not an insurmountable obstacle
column6: and the threat of invasion by the Christian invaders makes you forget about the internal conflict
column7: the restoration of a unified Arab state is only a matter of time.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_arab_union_title;Unite the Arabic Peoples;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_arab_union_desc;A nation must arise to lead the Arab peoples of the world into the future
column2: a greater power that would unite the Arab world from Morocco to the Mashriq.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_babylonia_title; Establish Babylonian Empire;;;;;;x;;
form_babylonia_desc; between the Tigris and Euphrates has settled once again become our independent state
column2: and the sages say: this is a sign from above. We need to make Baghdad new jewel of the Empire of Babylon
column3: erecting a tower above the old and bringing together the peoples of the ancient kingdom.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_baltic_states_title;Unite the Baltic States;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_baltic_states_desc;The time has become to unite the Baltic nations under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_baluchistan_title;Form Baluchistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_baluchistan_desc;The Baluchi people must be liberated and united under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_benelux_title;Form Benelux;Form Benelux;Form Benelux;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
form_benelux_desc;While originally an economic union
column2: there are certainly obvious benefits if we can take such union to another level
column3: but it would require us complete control over the other states and a good position in the international community.;While originally an economic union
column4: there are certainly obvious benefits if we can take such union to another level
column5: but it would require us complete control over the other states and a good position in the international community.;While originally an economic union
column6: there are certainly obvious benefits if we can take such union to another level
column7: but it would require us complete control over the other states and a good position in the international community.;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: form_boer_federation_title;Form the Boer Federation;;;;;;x;;
form_boer_federation_desc;As we established a leading presence in South Africa with our independent state uniting all of the people who think of themselves as Boer. Long live the independence
column2: long live the Boer Federation!;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_british_commonwealth_title;The British Commonwealth;;;;;;x
form_british_commonwealth_desc;By granting all our colonial subjects the same rights and privileges enjoyed by British nationals we would create a working intercontinental democracy.;;;;;;x
form_british_federation_title;The British Federation;;;;;;x

form_british_federation_desc;By granting all our white colonies the same rights and privileges as those enjoyed by British citizens and expanding direct political representation to these realms we could build the foundation of a long-lasting
column2: intercontinental British superpower.;;;;;;x

column1: form_brittany_title;Nazi Brittany;;;;;;x
form_brittany_desc;Although Burgundy has been given independence
column2: the Reich still directly administers land in northwest France. This creates a problem
column3: as not only are we still dealing with the French resistance
column4: the area is also cut off from Germany proper by Burgundy. By giving Brittany independence as a German protectorate
column5: we can solve this issue just as we did Burgundy.;;;;;;x

column1: form_burgundy_title;SS-Staat Burgund;;;;;;x
form_burgundy_desc;It is becoming increasingly clear that Germany will have trouble keeping the French Resistance down as well as keeping Himmler’s SS in line. In response
column2: the fuhrer has given his blessing to the creation of the SS State of Burgundy as oft requested by Himmler
column3: thus focusing Himmler’s attentions elsewhere and allowing Burgundy to deal with the Frenchmen.;;;;;;x

column1: form_china_title;Become China;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_china_desc;With the Qing dynasty deposed and Manchu domination finally ended
column2: the time has come to unite all of China under a single flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_czechoslovakia_title;Form Czechoslovakia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_czechoslovakia_desc;Bohemia and Slovakia cannot exist alone amidst the warring powers of Europe. We must unite under a single banner!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_danubia_title; Proclamation of the Federation of the Danube;;;;;;x;;
form_danubia_desc; Our great and mighty empire
column2: but in recent years have been very strong centrifugal tendencies
column3: because many people feel oppressed. To empire collapsed under its own weight
column4: you need to take steps to decentralize the state apparatus and to find a compromise solution acceptable to all nations;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_dravidistan_title;Form Dravidistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_dravidistan_desc;We must unite the Dravidian people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_dravidistan2_title;Form Dravidistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_dravidistan2_desc;We must unite the Dravidian people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_durrani_empire_title; revival of the Durrani Empire;;;;;;x;;
form_durrani_empire_desc; Although the empire created by Ahmad Shah
column2: broke into pieces
column3: a small emirate rulers Ganzi was once again unite the scattered tribes. New unifying force made the emerging capitalist class
column4: who helped the governor to eliminate the rebel lords
column6: and the faithful. Today we proclaim the re-establishment of the Durrani Empire - the power that goes with the times.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_france_title; Great Restoration;;;;;;x;;
form_france_desc; Tricolor again hung on all public buildings
column2: and crowds of French people from all over the streets of the state updated. In the center of Paris
column3: solemnly carried through a front standard. Viva la France!;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_french_indochina_title;French Indochina;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_french_indochina_desc;With the colonial government taking form in Saigon
column2: French administrators have advised elevating the region to a full department-- clearly with eyes on expanding French colonial rule to neighbors in Southeast Asia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_FSA_title;Form the Free States of America;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_FSA_desc;If the USA will not stand for truth and justice
column2: then the FSA shall rise and take its place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_germany_AUS_title;Three Hurrahs For Germany!;Pour l'Allemagne
column2: hip hip hip
column3: hourra !;Ein dreifaches Hurra auf Deutschland!;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: form_germany_AUS_desc;The great empire of the Habsburgs no longer exists
column2: but the unification of Germany under Austrian leadership
column3: as perhaps it was always meant to be
column4: still awaits us. Long live the German Empire
column5: one people ruled from the great city of Vienna!;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_gran_columbia_title; Revival of the Great Colombia;;;;;;x;;
form_gran_columbia_desc; Gran Colombia was founded in 1819 by South American colonists that ended Spanish rule
column2: but the selfish interests of local politicians took over the supporters of the revolutionary unity. Today we continue the case of Simon Bolivar and revives a single state in the name of freedom of all South America!;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_hindustan_title;Form Hindustan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_hindustan_desc;We must unite the people of Hindustan under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_hindustan2_title;Form Hindustan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_hindustan2_desc;We must unite the people of Hindustan under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_hre_title;Unite the Empire;;;;;;x;;
form_hre_desc;With all the German states under our control we are in a position to transform the Holy Roman Empire into a centralised nation.;;;;;;x;;
form_iberia_spa_title;Form Iberia!;;;;;;x;;
form_iberia_spa_desc;For many years the Iberian peninsula was divided by two nations
column2: with another one occupying its most southern part
column3: but we changed that and united the Iberian nations into one and we shall  remain so
column4: the great power of Europe in the most western part of the continent.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_iberia_por_title;Form Iberia!;;;;;;x;;
form_iberia_por_desc;For many years the Iberian peninsula was divided by two nations
column2: with another one occupying its most southern part
column3: but we changed that and united the Iberian nations into one and we shall  remain so
column4: the great power of Europe in the most western part of the continent.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_india_title;Form India;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_india_desc;The peoples of the Indian sub-continent must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_indonesia_title; Establish Indonesia;;;;;;x;;
form_indonesia_desc; After the liberation of the East Indies from the Dutch rule immediately threatened by the United Kingdom
column2: Portugal and Japan
column3: and the decrepit Qing Empire was not against easy prey. To maintain its independence
column4: the small island Asians have created a single state - Indonesia.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_laos_title;Form Laos;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
form_laos_desc;We must unite the Lao people under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;
form_la_plata_title; restore the state of La Plata;;;;;;x;;
form_la_plata_desc; Freed from colonial oppression
column2: the Argentines were separated by the boundaries of several states because of the ambition of those in power
column3: but today they are destined to again become one people
column4: by which the La Plata will take its rightful place in the world.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_maghreb_title;Unite the Maghreb;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_maghreb_desc;The Maghrebi cultures of western Africa must be united under a single flag
column2: an Arab nation mighty enough to shake the world order to its foundations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_marathas_title;Form Marathas;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_marathas_desc;The Maratha Empire was once the greatest force upon the Indian subcontinent. The time has come for it to rise once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_marathas2_title;Form Marathas;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_marathas2_desc;The Maratha Empire was once the greatest force upon the Indian subcontinent. The time has come for it to rise once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_north_german_confederation2_title;Call for German Unity;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_north_german_confederation2_desc;The conditions may be less than ideal
column2: but in order to maintain national security and strive towards North German hegemony
column3: we must approach our North German allies and create a confederation. Only with a united front

column1: form_rajputana_title;Form Rajputana;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_rajputana_desc;We must unite the Rajput people under a single flag
column2: to better resist the Imperialists from incursions into India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_rajputana_outside_title;Form the Raj;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_rajputana_outside_desc;The Rajput states must be collected into a single state
column2: one which will far better serve our needs as a stronger ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_rome_title;A New Rome;x;;;;;;;;;

form_rome_desc;As an Italian great power in posession of Rome we are in a position to create a new Roman Empire based on its ancient and glorious values and the new ideas of the modern world.;x;;;;;;;;;
form_saudi_arabia_title;Form Arabia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_saudi_arabia_desc;A united arab nation under our rule will make a strong and stable ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_slavic_union_title;Form the Slavic Union;;;;;;x;;
form_slavic_union_desc;We have reached a dominant position among our Slavic bretheren
column2: and it is time to lead our people to a new age of glory under the flag of all Slavs.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_south_africa_title;Form South Africa;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_south_africa_desc;With the Cape Colony under our control we can form a true
column2: united Boer republic-- one that at last will keep us from foreign domination and British rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_south_german_confederation2_title;Call for German Unity;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_south_german_confederation2_desc;The conditions may be less than ideal
column2: but in order to maintain national security and strive towards South German hegemony
column3: we must approach our South German allies and create a confederation. Only with a united front

column1: forming_thirteen_colonies_1_title;Create the Colony of America;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_1_desc;As we seizes our first larger colonies in the New World we realized that fully controlling these large populations from Europe is nearly impossible so we should choose an easier approach and select governors to rule our colonies with our leadership of course.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_2_title;Ceding Georgia to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_2_desc;As we colonized the province that we named Georgia we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_3_title;Ceding North Carolina to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_3_desc;As we colonized the northern part of the province that we named Carolina we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_4_title;Ceding West Virginia to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_4_desc;As we colonized the western part of Virginiawe should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_5_title;Ceding Maryland to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_5_desc;As we colonized the province that we named Maryland we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_6_title;Ceding Pennsylvania to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_6_desc;As we colonized the province that we named Pennsylvania we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_7_title;Ceding New Jersey to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_7_desc;As we colonized the province that we named New Jersey we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_8_title;Ceding New York to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_8_desc;As we colonized the province that we named New York we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_9_title;Ceding Massachusetts to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_9_desc;As we colonized the province that we named Massachusetts we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_10_title;Ceding New England to Colonial Leadership;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_10_desc;As we colonized the province that we named New England we should cede it to our stabilized and functional colonial government with its Virginian capital.;;;;;;x;;
forming_thirteen_colonies_main_title;Forming the Thirteen Colonies;;;;;;x;;

forming_thirteen_colonies_main_desc;As we colonized most of the free areas to the Eastern coast of the new land our original colonial government became overwhelmed with the control of this huge colony so we should try to implement some changes and redesign it
column2: so it can fulfill its purpose in a way more effective way
column3: also allowing it free expansion towards the west.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_transcaucasia_title;Unite Transcaucasia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_transcaucasia_desc;Small Caucasian nations were at old bloody war with each other
column2: but when they found themselves caught between two empires - the Russian and Ottoman
column3: the peoples of the Caucasus at an accelerated pace began to seek a compromise that would accept all. Now
column4: when we control most of our mountains
column5: one Transcaucasian state can materialize from a dream into reality.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_turkestan_title; Establish a unified Turkestan;;;;;;x;;
form_turkestan_desc; Turkic peoples of Central Asia have long been separated
column2: revealing a tasty morsel for the supergiants such as the Russian Empire and China
column3: but now we have the hope of independence and prosperity - a single Turkestan state.;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_union_latinoamericana_title; Latin American Union;;;;;;x;;
form_union_latinoamericana_desc; Latin American nations have a common history of origin of the Iberian peoples
column2: but because of the petty interests of corrupt politicians and the interference of third countries
column3: they were separated for a long time. But today - a historic day and the Simon Bolivar's dream finally realized. As time passed separatism! Ur Union! Viva la union latinoamericana!;;;;;;x;;

column1: form_united_kingdom_title;Form the United Kingdom;;;;;;x;;
form_united_kingdom_desc;Being in control of Great Britain we can now unite this island.;;;;;;x;;
form_yugoslavia_title;Form Yugoslavia;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_yugoslavia_desc;The Slavic peoples of the Balkans must be united under a single banner: ours. It is the only way to keep us free of rule from European powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
restore_pbc_title; Peru-Bolivian Confederation;;;;;;x;;
restore_pbc_desc; After the collapse of Peru-Bolivian Confederation
column2: during the XIX century
column3: Peru and Bolivia were many internecine wars in order to restore it
column5: not one of them failed. But now
column6: when ever an acute danger of being enslaved by other countries
column7: Peruvians and Bolivians cast aside their feud and remember that they - the southern andtsy! Long live the new Peru-Bolivian Confederation!;;;;;;x;;

column1: push_the_ottomans_back_title;The Greeks bow to our Emperor and Unite!;;;;;;x;;

push_the_ottomans_back_desc;Many years have passed since the fall of Constantinople to the Ottomans in 1453. After the fall and the death of Konstantinos Paleologos his brothers managed to keep their home castle in Mystras and the land gone with it as vassals and allies of the Sultan. Konstantinos Paleologos is the Emperor now. He is great great great grand son of the last Emperor! He aims to unite the greeks under his banner reinforce their byzantine identity and ultimately claim their rights upon the greek Provinces !! This is not going to be unanswered by the Ottomans. But for know the Turks are busy elsewhere.;;;;;;x;;
reclaim_the_old_glory_title;Constantinople Should Be OUR CAPITAL !;;;;;;x;;

reclaim_the_old_glory_desc;The Byzantine Empire has grown in importance and territories the last years. Alas the glorious Emperor Konstantinos Paleologos that took back the greek lands from the Ottomans has long been dead. But his dream isn't! The byzantine-greek nation that he created feels now strong enough to reclaim its rightfull capital Kwnstantinoupolis. And that's not all ! Manouil Komnhnos
column2: a descendant of that old Emperor with the same name wants the Byzantine Empire to reclaim all the provinces that his great great great grand father lost to the Seljuk Turks. That is Mikra Asia! To acomplish that he decides to move the capital to Salonika
column3: previously the second in importance city of the Ottoman Empire and much closer to Kwnstantinoupolis than Mystras. He thinks that this is a symbolic as well as a practical decision. This way he will be able to control the war operations to recapture Kwnstantinoupolis. Furthermore he will be to influence the population of Thrace if they are to assist him in his plan to ceize Kwnstantinopolis from the Otomans. Fortunately the people Mikra Asia are fed up with Ottoman oppression and stories about the good old days of the Byzantine Emperors are told. As of today they accept Manouil as their saviour and the Byzantine banner as their flag !;;;;;;x;;

column1: vasileios_voulgaroktonos_title;The Slavs of the Balkans bow to our Emperor!;;;;;;x;;

vasileios_voulgaroktonos_desc;The glorious Emperor Manouil Komnhnos that took back Kwnstantinoupolis from the Ottomans is dead. Unfortunately he didn’t see his dream materialised. Vasileios from the house of Makedwns is now Emperor. And he has decided to follow the steps of his predecesor. He decides to move the capital to Kwnstantinoupolis and bring the city to its former glory. A palace will be built upon the place where the old sacred palace of the ancient Byzantine Emperors lied. Aquedacts
column2: Ipodromos
column3: and other great projects will be undertaken. His goal is to show the splendor of the Byzantine empire and make everybody have no dought that the Byzantine ownership of Kwnstantinoupolis is not temporary. But he also has something else in his mind. For centuries the Slav people of the Balkans are oppresed by the Ottomans. Vasileios
column4: as his anchestor with the same name in 11th century
column5: feels that he has to help the Orthodox Slavs to realize their Orthodox identity. Vasileios sent missionaries
column6: organized  cultural events and had an intense diplomatic activity
column7: including briberies and mariages. The result is that the Slavs have reconfirmed their Orthodox identity and realized that they are more Byzantines than subjects to the Sultan. Today is a glorious day for the Byzantine Empire!  The Slavs decided to accept Vasileio as their saviour and the byzantine banner as their flag !! ;;;;;;x;;

column1: eastern_empire_title;The Eastern Empire Issue;;;;;;x;;
eastern_empire_desc;Many years have passed since Emperor Vasileios from the house of Makedwns annexed the Balkans. The Byzantine Empire is one of the greatest Empires in the world
column2: in terms of territories
column3: population
column4: production and money. The Ottomans are falling apart with continues national
column5: social or political rebelions. A debate has risen among the scholars of the Empire. The Eastern Roman Empire
column7: the coast of the middle east and Anatolia as far as Armenia
column8: is lost for almost 1000 years. But there is a lot of land
column9: raw material and  workforce (or else conscriptable population)
column10: there for a thriving Emprire like ours to let go. The past several years all the Emperors tried to make a bond with all these different people. The main obstacle was the cultural differences and religion. Konstantinos
column12: thought of something clever. The bond doesn't have to be religious or cultural. It will just be military! As long as our mighty army is able to protect their properties
column13: land and their way of life
column14: they should accept our dominion. This way he persuaded the people that live in the territories of the former Eastern Roman Empire
column15: to bow to him and accept the Byzantine banner as their flag !!;;;;;;x;;

column1: western_empire_title;The Western Empire Issue;;;;;;x;;

western_empire_desc;Many years have passed and the Byzantine Empire is now the greatest empire on Earth. At least in terms of prestige and culture. Byzantine Empire owns all the eastern mediteranean territories. Our people now share the dream of our new Emperor Ioustinianos. If there should be a nation to reclaim the glory and territories of the old Roman Empire
column2: it is our nation. The people of the Italian and Iberian peninula
column3: as wel as the muslims of the north africa would be delighted to belong in the greatest empire on earth. As of today they accept Ioustinianos as their saviour and the byzantine banner as their flag. The people of Rome secede their land to our Emperor in order for the new capital to be rebuilt !! Great projects are undertaken
column4: like the new palace and Ippodromos. Colloseum is rebuilt !! That much splendor was not to be seen even in the old Rome !!;;;;;;x;;
